spec_data.Name: php-pear-Console-ProgressBar
spec_data.Description:
The class allows you to display progress bars in your terminal. You can use
this for displaying the status of downloads or other tasks that take some
time.

spec_data.Summary: This class provides you with an easy-to-use interface to progress bars
